00002 #include <process/process.h>

00008 process_t* systemIdlePtr = 0;
00009 process_t* systemProcPtr = 0;
00010 
00011 void systemIdleProcess()
00012 {
00013         systemIdlePtr = getCurrentProcess();
00014 
00015         for (;;)
00016         {
00017                 //Halt the processor tell the next interrupt
00018                 asm volatile("hlt");
00019         }
00020 }
00021 
00022 void systemMainProcess()
00023 {
00024         createNewProcess(settingsReadValue("kernel.onstart"), init_vfs());
00025         enable_interrupts();
00026 
00027         systemProcPtr = getCurrentProcess();
00028 
00029         int schedulerIter = 0;
00030         process_t* schedulerPtr = 0;
00031         int numNonSystem = 0;
00032 
00033         //Loop and continually halt the processor, this will cause the processor to idle between interrupts
00034         for (;;) {
00035 
00036                 //Check all messages
00037                 while (1)
00038                 {
00039                         //Grab the top message
00040                         process_message pb_top = postbox_top(&getCurrentProcess()->m_processPostbox);
00041 
00042                         if (pb_top.ID != -1)
00043                         {
00044                                 //Its a message to be handled
00045 
00046                         
00047                         }
00048                         else
00049                         {
00050                                 break;
00051                         }
00052 
00053                 }
00054 
00055                 numNonSystem = 0;
00056 
00057                 schedulerIter = 0;
00058                 //Shut down all processes that need a-killin
00059                 while (1)
00060                 {
00061                         schedulerPtr = schedulerReturnProcess(schedulerIter);
00062 
00063                         if (schedulerPtr == 0)
00064                         {
00065                                 break;
00066                         }
00067                         else if (schedulerPtr->m_shouldDestroy == 1)
00068                         {
00069                                 //Must remove this process and kill it! so disable interrupts don't wanna be interrupted
00070                                 disable_interrupts();
00071 
00072                                 if ((schedulerPtr == systemIdlePtr) || (schedulerPtr == systemProcPtr))
00073                                 {
00074                                         DEBUG_PRINT("Cannot close SystemIdle or System\n");
00075                                         schedulerPtr->m_shouldDestroy = 0;
00076                                 }
00077                                 else
00078                                 {
00079                                         printf("Process %i (%s) terminated with return value %i\n", schedulerPtr->m_ID, schedulerPtr->m_Name, schedulerPtr->m_returnValue);
00080 
00081                                         schedulerRemove(schedulerPtr);
00082 
00083                                         DEBUG_PRINT("Freeing process %x (%i:%s) current process %i\n", schedulerPtr, schedulerPtr->m_ID, schedulerPtr->m_Name, getCurrentProcess()->m_ID);
00084                                         freeProcess(schedulerPtr);
00085 
00086                                 }
00087 
00088                                 //Enable interrupts once the deed is done
00089                                 enable_interrupts();
00090                         }
00091                         else
00092                         {
00093                         }
00094 
00095                         //Count up the number of non system processes (To check there is a interface active)
00096                         if ((schedulerPtr != systemIdlePtr) && (schedulerPtr != systemProcPtr))
00097                         {
00098                                 numNonSystem++;
00099                         }
00100 
00101                         schedulerIter++;
00102                 }
00103 
00104                 //If this is the last process alive?
00105                 if (numNonSystem == 0)
00106                 {
00107                         if (strcmp(settingsReadValue("kernel.restart_onstart"), "yes") == 0)
00108                         {
00109 
00110                                 disable_interrupts();
00111 
00112                                 printf("Creating new instance of %s\n", settingsReadValue("kernel.onstart"));
00113 
00114                                 createNewProcess( settingsReadValue("kernel.onstart"), init_vfs());
00115 
00116                                 enable_interrupts();
00117 
00118                         }
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 //Sleep the current process
00122                 schedulerBlockMe();
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 void systemProcess()
00127 {
00128     //Disable interrupts while forking
00129     disable_interrupts();
00130 
00131     int forkedID = kfork();
00132     
00133     //Enable them once the processes are set up
00134     enable_interrupts();
00135 
00136 
00137     if (forkedID == 1)
00138     {
00139         set_process_name(getCurrentProcess(), "System");
00140         systemMainProcess();
00141     }
00142     else
00143     {
00144         set_process_name(getCurrentProcess(), "SystemIdle");
00145         systemIdleProcess();
00146     }
00147 
00148 }
